Description

Recipes

On this site you can find a lot of different recipes, but at the moment there are only bakery. To be honest it was planned just for such recipes, so you can feel free and be sure you'll find something delecious to cook here.

Recipes of different countries were collected to created a base of the most unusual and tasty dishes. Here you can find recipes of standart things like "Carrot cake", "Ginger cookies", but you'll see the recipes in a different way. Just try and you'll understand cooking is funny, just try something new.

Ingredients

This section provides you information about the most used ingredients in the cooking process.

It will be very cognitive expecialy in case when you don't have necessary ingredient. So, you may check this section to find some ingredients that can substitute missing one. It gives recomendations and reference information about ingredients as well.

Ideas

Visit this section if you want to find out something new, look at daily things from a different angle.

There you may find a lot of interesting facts and so-called "lifehacks" about cooking. They will help you to make cooking process quicker, more convinient and pleasant.
